explanation: [0-0] In front of a green background wall, there is a metallic table. On the table is a hydraulic press. A white round tray is placed on the circular base of the hydraulic press, and on the tray is a yellow and orange cake. Five lit red candles are inserted into the cake. The upper part of the hydraulic press is above the candles.

[0-3] Subsequently, the hydraulic press slowly descends. When it presses the candles, the candles are extinguished, and white smoke appears. Then the candles and cake are crushed. A cake-like mixture of candles and cake seeps out around the hydraulic press.

[0-3] Subsequently, the hydraulic press slowly descends. When it presses the candles, the candles are extinguished, and white smoke appears. Then the candles and cake are crushed. A cake-like mixture of candles and cake seeps out around the hydraulic press.

[0-3] Subsequently, the hydraulic press slowly descends. When it presses the candles, the candles are extinguished, and white smoke appears. Then the candles and cake are crushed. A cake-like mixture of candles and cake seeps out around the hydraulic press.

[3-6] Then the scene switches. Many candies wrapped in orange and blue foil are placed in the groove below the hydraulic press. As the hydraulic press descends, the candies are crushed into a sticky paste and flow out from the multiple round holes of the hydraulic press's pressing plate, forming long strips of chocolate.

[3-6] Then the scene switches. Many candies wrapped in orange and blue foil are placed in the groove below the hydraulic press. As the hydraulic press descends, the candies are crushed into a sticky paste and flow out from the multiple round holes of the hydraulic press's pressing plate, forming long strips of chocolate.

[3-6] Then the scene switches. Many candies wrapped in orange and blue foil are placed in the groove below the hydraulic press. As the hydraulic press descends, the candies are crushed into a sticky paste and flow out from the multiple round holes of the hydraulic press's pressing plate, forming long strips of chocolate.

[6-8] The scene switches again. There are three sandwich biscuits in green, brown, and pink. The sandwich biscuits are arranged in a row on a round iron plate below. As the hydraulic press descends, all the biscuits are crushed, and the filling of the biscuits flows to the edge of the round plate below.

[6-8] The scene switches again. There are three sandwich biscuits in green, brown, and pink. The sandwich biscuits are arranged in a row on a round iron plate below. As the hydraulic press descends, all the biscuits are crushed, and the filling of the biscuits flows to the edge of the round plate below.

[8-11] Then the scene switches. Three heart-shaped rainbow lollipops are placed on the round plate below the hydraulic press. As the hydraulic press descends, the lollipops are crushed into pieces, debris bursts out, and white powder floats around the hydraulic press, enveloping the picture.

[8-11] Then the scene switches. Three heart-shaped rainbow lollipops are placed on the round plate below the hydraulic press. As the hydraulic press descends, the lollipops are crushed into pieces, debris bursts out, and white powder floats around the hydraulic press, enveloping the picture.

[8-11] Then the scene switches. Three heart-shaped rainbow lollipops are placed on the round plate below the hydraulic press. As the hydraulic press descends, the lollipops are crushed into pieces, debris bursts out, and white powder floats around the hydraulic press, enveloping the picture.

[11-14] Then the scene switches again. This time, an ice cream is placed on the lower platform of the hydraulic press. There are three different colored ice cream scoops on top of the ice cream: white, pink, and green. Below the ice cream is a yellow ice cream cone. As the hydraulic press descends, the cone and the ice cream scoops are crushed into a colorful cake-like mass that spreads out along the machine.
